alert.note: Alert for South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA COUNTY THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taconite, or 8 miles east of Grand Rapids, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pengilly around 230 AM CDT. Nashwauk around 245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Swan Lake, Bovey, Marble, Calumet and Hill Annex Mine State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
